1: בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֡וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִפְקֹ֣ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>shall punish</n> יְהוָה֩ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּחַרְב֨וֹ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>sword</n> הַקָּשָׁ֜ה <sup>7186 </sup> <n>with his sore</n> וְהַגְּדוֹלָ֣ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>and great</n> וְהַֽחֲזָקָ֗ה <sup>2389 </sup> <n>and strong</n> עַ֤ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Even</n> לִוְיָתָן֙ <sup>3882 </sup> <n>leviathan</n> נָחָ֣שׁ <sup>5175 </sup> <n>serpent</n> בָּרִ֔חַ <sup>1281 </sup> <n>the piercing</n> וְעַל֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Even</n> לִוְיָתָ֔ן <sup>3882 </sup> <n>even leviathan</n> נָחָ֖שׁ <sup>5175 </sup> <n>serpent</n> עֲקַלָּת֑וֹן <sup>6129 </sup> <n>that crooked</n> וְהָרַ֥ג <sup>2026 </sup> <n>and he shall slay</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַתַּנִּ֖ין <sup>8577 </sup> <n>the dragon</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בַּיָּֽם׃ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>that [is] in the sea</n> ס
2: בַּיּ֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֑וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> כֶּ֥רֶם <sup>3754 </sup> <n>ye unto her A vineyard</n> חֶ֖מֶד <sup>2531 </sup> <n>desirable</n> עַנּוּ־ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>testify</n> לָֽהּ׃
3: אֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I the LORD</n> נֹֽצְרָ֔הּ <sup>5341 </sup> <n>do keep</n> לִרְגָעִ֖ים <sup>7281 </sup> <n>it every moment</n> אַשְׁקֶ֑נָּה <sup>8248 </sup> <n>it I will water</n> פֶּ֚ן <sup>6435 </sup> <n>one</n> יִפְקֹ֣ד <sup>6485 </sup> <n>lest [any] hurt</n> עָלֶ֔יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> לַ֥יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>it night</n> וָי֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and day</n> אֶצֳּרֶֽנָּה׃ <sup>5341 </sup> <n>it I will keep</n>
4: חֵמָ֖ה <sup>2534 </sup> <n>Fury</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>have</n> לִ֑י מִֽי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>someone</n> יִתְּנֵ֜נִי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>[is] not in me who would set</n> שָׁמִ֥יר <sup>8068 </sup> <n>the briers</n> שַׁ֙יִת֙ <sup>7898 </sup> <n>[and] thorns</n> בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>battle</n> אֶפְשְׂעָ֥ה <sup>6585 </sup> <n>step</n> בָ֖הּ אֲצִיתֶ֥נָּה <sup>6702 </sup> <n>through them I would burn</n> יָּֽחַד׃ <sup>3162 </sup> <n>them together</n>
5: א֚וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>Or</n> יַחֲזֵ֣ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>Or let him take hold</n> בְּמָעוּזִּ֔י <sup>4581 </sup> <n>of my strength</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[that] he may make</n> שָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> לִ֑י שָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>with me [and] he shall make</n> לִּֽי׃
6: הַבָּאִים֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>He shall cause them that come</n> יַשְׁרֵ֣שׁ <sup>8327 </sup> <n>to take root</n> יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> יָצִ֥יץ <sup>6692 </sup> <n>shall blossom</n> וּפָרַ֖ח <sup>6524 </sup> <n>and bud</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וּמָלְא֥וּ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>and fill</n> פְנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>the face</n> תֵבֵ֖ל <sup>8398 </sup> <n>of the world</n> תְּנוּבָֽה׃ <sup>8570 </sup> <n>with fruit</n> ס
7: הַכְּמַכַּ֥ת <sup>4347 </sup> <n>him as he smote</n> מַכֵּ֖הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Hath he smitten</n> הִכָּ֑הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>those that smote</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Or</n> כְּהֶ֥רֶג <sup>2027 </sup> <n>according to the slaughter</n> הֲרֻגָ֖יו <sup>2026 </sup> <n>him? [or] is he slain</n> הֹרָֽג׃ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>of them that are slain</n>
8: בְּסַאסְּאָ֖ה <sup>5432 </sup> <n>In measure</n> בְּשַׁלְחָ֣הּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>when it shooteth forth</n> תְּרִיבֶ֑נָּה <sup>7378 </sup> <n>thou wilt debate</n> הָגָ֛ה <sup>1898 </sup> <n>with it he stayeth</n> בְּרוּח֥וֹ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>wind</n> הַקָּשָׁ֖ה <sup>7186 </sup> <n>his rough</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> קָדִֽים׃ <sup>6921 </sup> <n>of the east wind</n>
9: לָכֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> בְּזֹאת֙ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>By this</n> יְכֻפַּ֣ר <sup>3722 </sup> <n>be purged</n> עֲוֹֽן־ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>therefore shall the iniquity</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> וְזֶ֕ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>and this</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>will be the full</n> פְּרִ֖י <sup>6529 </sup> <n>and this [is] all the fruit</n> הָסִ֣ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>to take away</n> חַטָּאת֑וֹ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>his sin</n> בְּשׂוּמ֣וֹ ׀ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>when he maketh</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אַבְנֵ֣י <sup>68 </sup> <n>all the stones</n> מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>of the altar</n> כְּאַבְנֵי־ <sup>68 </sup> <n>stones</n> גִר֙ <sup>1615 </sup> <n>as chalkstones</n> מְנֻפָּצ֔וֹת <sup>5310 </sup> <n>that are beaten in sunder</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יָקֻ֥מוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall not stand up</n> אֲשֵׁרִ֖ים <sup>842 </sup> <n>the groves</n> וְחַמָּנִֽים׃ <sup>2553 </sup> <n>and images</n>
10: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עִ֤יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> בְּצוּרָה֙ <sup>1219 </sup> <n>Yet the defenced</n> בָּדָ֔ד <sup>910 </sup> <n>[shall be] desolate</n> נָוֶ֕ה <sup>5116 </sup> <n>[and] the habitation</n> מְשֻׁלָּ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>forsaken</n> וְנֶעֱזָ֖ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>and left</n> כַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>like a wilderness</n> שָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> יִרְעֶ֥ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>feed</n> עֵ֛גֶל <sup>5695 </sup> <n>there shall the calf</n> וְשָׁ֥ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> יִרְבָּ֖ץ <sup>7257 </sup> <n>and there shall he lie down</n> וְכִלָּ֥ה <sup>3615 </sup> <n>and consume</n> סְעִפֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5585 </sup> <n>the branches</n>
11: בִּיבֹ֤שׁ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>thereof are withered</n> קְצִירָהּ֙ <sup>7105 </sup> <n>When the boughs</n> תִּשָּׁבַ֔רְנָה <sup>7665 </sup> <n>they shall be broken off</n> נָשִׁ֕ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>the women</n> בָּא֖וֹת <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> מְאִיר֣וֹת <sup>215 </sup> <n>[and] set them on fire</n> אוֹתָ֑הּ <sup>853 </sup> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>for it [is] a people</n> בִּינוֹת֙ <sup>998 </sup> <n>of no understanding</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> כֵּן֙ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>after that</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יְרַחֲמֶ֣נּוּ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>them will not have mercy</n> עֹשֵׂ֔הוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>therefore he that made</n> וְיֹצְר֖וֹ <sup>3335 </sup> <n>on them and he that formed</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יְחֻנֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>2603 </sup> <n>them will shew them no favour</n> ס
12: וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יַחְבֹּ֧ט <sup>2251 </sup> <n>shall beat off</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> מִשִּׁבֹּ֥לֶת <sup>7641 </sup> <n>from the channel</n> הַנָּהָ֖ר <sup>5104 </sup> <n>of the river</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> נַ֣חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>unto the stream</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> וְאַתֶּ֧ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>and you</n> תְּלֻקְּט֛וּ <sup>3950 </sup> <n>and ye shall be gathered</n> לְאַחַ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>one</n> אֶחָ֖ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>by one</n> בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>O ye children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> ס
13: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִתָּקַע֮ <sup>8628 </sup> <n>shall be blown</n> בְּשׁוֹפָ֣ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>trumpet</n> גָּדוֹל֒ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>[that] the great</n> וּבָ֗אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and they shall come</n> הָאֹֽבְדִים֙ <sup>6 </sup> <n>which were ready to perish</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אַשּׁ֔וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>of Assyria</n> וְהַנִּדָּחִ֖ים <sup>5080 </sup> <n>and the outcasts</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> מִצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> וְהִשְׁתַּחֲו֧וּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and shall worship</n> לַיהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּהַ֥ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mount</n> הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in the holy</n> בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>at Jerusalem</n>
